description.narrative: By 2020 local counsellors, village development committees, communities and women's and youth organizations have capacity to participate in social planning and budgeting, and citizen monitoring., which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Child Poverty / Public Finance For Children, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2020 Children (girls/boys) and women, especially the most disadvantaged, have better access to social protection programmes and the state budget allocation to exercise their rights.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2020 local counsellors, village development committees, communities and women’s and youth organizations have capacity to participate in social planning and budgeting, and citizen monitoring.

description.narrative: UNICEF-Burkina Faso collaborated with the Government to strenghen the national capacity on decentralized planning. Actions were initiated to operationalize newly developped municipal Local Development Plans (LDPs) in two municipalities and formulate 20 new municipal LDPs using an innovative, participatory planning process. Based on the pilot from 2018, UNICEF is also supporting the Government to revise the methodological guide for devleopment of the LDPs. A tripartite partnership between municipal governments, mining industry and UNICEF is currently tested in two municipalities. The partnership envisages building child-friendly municipalities through the LDPs, while promoting child right issues within mining industry's corporate social responsabilty plans | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:31/12/2019
